name: Walk To Beach or City 1 -Our #1 Requested Room
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is perfect for the all ages and lifestyles. We have access to bars, restaurants, museums, the beach, major highways and train stations all within walking distance.  We are located on a quiet street in the middle of everything.  There are also convenient stores, bars, and restaurants located on the same block.
description:
Centrally located 2 family home, walking distance to the beach, restaurants, museums, colleges, bars, & historic landmarks (all between .1-2 miles.) Access all forms of public transportation & major highways in minutes. Street parking available.

The space
Large carpeted room located on the third floor of our home. There is a king size bed with Tufts & Needle mattress, a couch which turns into a bed with space for a total of 5 people to sleep. Cable with all movie channels, free wi-fi, an iron and plenty of bureau and hanger space.

Guest access
You will have access to the main hall, bedroom, shared bathroom (with Airbnb guests only) located in the hallway and the common fridge, microwave and toaster located in the hall outside the room.

Other things to note
